      • paddingBytecode

        private static int paddingBytecode(PseudoBytecode head)
        Adds padding (NOP) at the beginning of pseudo bytecode to make the new bytecode size dividable by 4, then no branch target adjustment is needed in the original code.
        Parameters:
        head - the first pseudo bytecode (must be NOP)
        Returns:
        the new bytecode size

      • generateBinaries

        private static byte[] generateBinaries(PseudoBytecode bhead,
                                       int bsize)
        Generating binary code from pseudo code, the size and the code list are padded and well calculated.
        Parameters:
        bhead - the first pseude bytecode (must be a NOP)
        bsize - the size of the bytecode
        Returns:
        generated bytecodes
